input.notesFromWorker: Installed new circuit breaker in Building A. Completed safety inspection. Had to wait 2 hours for building manager to access roof.
photosOCR: Electrical panel with label 'Building A Main'

expectedOutput.summary: Electrician installed new circuit breaker in Building A and completed safety inspection. Work delayed by 2 hours awaiting building manager access.
expectedOutput.challenges: Delayed 2 hours waiting for building manager key access

input.notesFromWorker: Emergency callout - water leak under kitchen sink. Replaced washer and tightened connection. Customer satisfied. No photos available.

expectedOutput.summary: Plumber responded to emergency water leak under kitchen sink. Replaced washer and tightened connection. Customer satisfied.

input.notesFromWorker: Custom shelving installation - mostly completed. Owner requested design change mid-job. Need to return tomorrow to finish adjustments. Ran out of materials (special brackets).
photosOCR: Partially installed shelving with visible gaps

expectedOutput.summary: Carpenter installed custom shelving; owner requested design changes mid-project. Work paused; follow-up scheduled for material adjustment and completion.
expectedOutput.challenges: Owner design change; ran out of special brackets
expectedOutput.safety_notes: Shelving secured; safe to pause work
expectedOutput.follow_up_reason: Return visit needed: 1) Install new brackets per updated design 2) Adjust shelving alignment 3) Final touch-up

input.notesFromWorker: Regular lawn mow, hedge trim, and garden cleanup. Rotated garden beds. Customer mentioned previous contractor never trimmed hedges, so took extra time. All work completed to customer satisfaction.

expectedOutput.summary: Gardener completed lawn mowing, hedge trimming, and garden cleanup. Customer satisfied. Garden beds rotated for seasonal maintenance.
expectedOutput.challenges: Extra time spent on hedge trimming due to previous neglect

moderationExamples.title: Clean Report
moderationExamples.input: Electrician completed circuit breaker installation and safety inspection. No issues.

expectedOutput.reason: Factual work report with no policy violations.

moderationExamples.title: PII Exposure
moderationExamples.input: Contact John Smith at john@example.com or 0412345678 if you have questions about the work.

expectedOutput.reason: Contains personal email address, phone number, and full name. Should have been redacted.

moderationExamples.title: Mild Profanity
moderationExamples.input: Damn, that was a tricky job but we got it done. Customer is happy.

expectedOutput.reason: Mild profanity below threshold (0.7). Work report is professional overall.

moderationExamples.title: Hate Speech Flag
moderationExamples.input: Job completed, but those workers from that group are useless and always mess up.

expectedOutput.reason: Discriminatory language and group stereotyping detected. Escalate to human review.

expectedOutput.text_content:
Safety Inspection Certificate
Date: 2025-01-15
Location: Building A
Inspector: [NAME_REDACTED]
Compliance Status: PASS
expectedOutput.notes: Clear, high-contrast document. All information readable.

expectedOutput.text_content: Electrical panel (text illegible due to blur)
expectedOutput.notes: Image is significantly blurred. Text content unreliable. Recommend re-upload with clearer photo.

summaryExamples.title: Multi-Report Summary

input.summary: Electrician completed circuit breaker installation and safety inspection.
Plumber fixed water leak under kitchen sink by replacing washer.

summaryExamples.expectedOutput: 2 jobs completed • Electrical and plumbing work • No blockers

summaryExamples.title: Summary with Follow-up

input.summary: Carpenter installed custom shelving; design changes needed mid-project.

summaryExamples.expectedOutput: 1 job in progress • Custom shelving installation • Follow-up required
